name: UpdateNewsletterContent
description:
Update a newsletter variant's content.

Use this tool to update the content of a specific newsletter variant, such as a version in a different language or part of an A/B test. Ideal for modifying the body or detail changes in a newsletter.

parameters.name: newsletter_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the newsletter you want to update.

parameters.name: message_content_id
parameters.description: The identifier for a message within a newsletter, used in A/B tests or multiple language variants. Retrieve IDs via getNewsletters.

value_schema.description: The identifier of a message in a newsletter. If your newsletter is an A/B test or has multiple languages, you may have multiple `content_id` values for your newsletter. You can [get a newsletter](#operation/getNewsletters) to find your newsletter's content IDs.

parameters.name: newsletter_variant_content
parameters.description: A JSON object with the updated content details for the newsletter variant, including changes to the body or specific elements.
